channel.title: Gaia online auto poster!(perl related)
channel.description: Well if you have ever been on gaiaonline its sort of like myspace but you get to create an anime type avatar and buy clothes and accesories for it to look cool and to get money you have to post in the forums and pm people and such like that. Well Im sort of a newbie to perl but i know that you can like parse out information from a websites html source and i was thinking perhaps there is a way to make a auto forum poster... if perhaps someone could help with some base code for an auto forum poster or help me with the project...

wouldnt quite work like that i dont think

item.title: Gaia online auto poster!(perl related)
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

It’s uber easy with HTML

I don’t know exactly how it would look, but it woul dbe something like this:

<form action="loginpageforgaia.php" method="post">
U: <input type="text" name="whatevertheusertagis">
P: <input type="password" name="whateverthepasstagis">
M: <input type="text" name="whateverthemessagetagis">
<input type="submit">
</form>

You could just put a refresh tag at the top, and set a default value to the user/pass/message boxes.

Read full topic
